public class DateTimeUtils

getCurrentDateTime

public static java.lang.String getCurrentDateTime(java.lang.String format,
                                                  long offsetMillis)
Return a string with the current date and time (with an offset), using a specific output format

Parameters:
format - Output format as defined in SimpleDateFormat
offsetMillis - Offset from current date/time in milliseconds (use negative value for the past)
Returns:
current date/time with offset

dateStringMatchesFormat

public static boolean dateStringMatchesFormat(java.lang.String dateValueStr,
                                              java.lang.String dateFormatStr)
Check whether a date/time string's format matches a given pattern

Parameters:
dateValueStr - Date/time string value to check
dateFormatStr - Pattern (as defined by SimpleDateFormat) to check against
Returns:
true if value matches pattern, false otherwise; false if any parameter is empty (null, or empty string)
